metadata.name: Mint Pass #1
metadata.description:
This is a collection of Mint Pass for Dragon Age NFT - combination of blockchain and action RPG.  
Dragon Age NFT holders will get benefits of DLC and in-game items.  
Mint Pass holders can burn their Mint Pass and get Dragon Age NFT for free.  
Visit Site and mint free with Mint Pass; get the benefits and enjoy the first ever experience.
